system.effect: The force of the blow cuts deep into the leg, grinding against bone and tearing ligaments apart. The target is Stunned for 1 round, is knocked Prone, and suffers Blood Loss. The leg is Useless until the target receives medical attention.

description.value:
Rending Damage to Leg (Severity 7)

The force of the blow cuts deep into the leg, grinding against bone and tearing ligaments apart. The target is Stunned for 1 round, is knocked Prone, and suffers Blood Loss. The leg is Useless until the target receives medical attention.
